name: Stuck in a Loop (Lena Taylor, chilly__0, JSelfe)
name_original: Stuck in a Loop (Lena Taylor, chilly__0, JSelfe)
description:
Stuck in a Loop is a game we made as an entry for the 47th Ludum Dare game jam.  The theme of the jam was "stuck in a loop".  This is an action game played from a top down perspective.

You play as a robot who must make its way through a nightclub to find and defeat the final boss.  You have three unique weapons which cycle through a loop based on the background music.  Be sure to listen for the switching cue.  Using these weapons, you can defeat the robot minions patrolling the nightclub as you progress to the final room.  If the minions spot you, they will follow you until you defeat them or stay undetected long enough for them to return to their patrols.  Defeat the final boss in order to win the game.
